title: indy ui
description: Project developed using nextjs and tailwindcss.
This is a UI component library aimed at indie hackers. All the components included, and those that will be added, are programmed by me, drawing inspiration from various SaaS websites.
The goal is to contribute to the community, allowing developers to focus more on their products without wasting time on design.

This is a project I have wanted to undertake for a long time, and now that I have a better understanding of Next.js, I am making it happen. I plan to improve it over time, adding more components and possibly turning it into an npm package.

title: manage inventory
description: Project developed using nextjs, tailwindcss, prisma and postgresql.
It's an inventory manager that includes CRUD operations and item filtering. I built it to continue learning Next.js and also to learn Prisma and PostgreSQL.
The database is hosted on Neon Serverless Postgres.
I learned how to connect PostgreSQL with Prisma, practicing by creating an 'actions' folder and importing functions into components for communication.
Afterwards, there are simple things like using useState to retrieve data from creation and update item forms, and basic route handling.
